accesstoken.description: Access-Token used for communication with cloud after account creation

refreshtoken.description: Refresh token used to refresh the access token before getting expired

tokentype.description: Access-Token type, eg. “bearer” type can be used, ie. simply including the access-token string in the message

expiresin.description: Access-Token remaining life time in seconds (-1 if permanent)

uid.description: Unique user identifier created for this account

redirecturi.description: Using this URI, the client needs to reconnect to a redirected server

sid.description: Server UUID to indicate a specific server in the redirected uri location
